backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the lottery system, defining all core types (UserProfile, LotteryPool, Ticket, WalletTransaction, etc.) and mixing in authorization and blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs and titles to their associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for the lottery app build.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted reference document summarizing the intended implementation details and correct hook/import names for each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Lottery Coin System', mounting the app at the #root div and loading main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that sets up TanStack Router with all user-facing and admin routes, wraps the app in AuthProvider/QueryClientProvider/ThemeProvider, and renders the Navbar and ProfileSetupModal in the root layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminActionLogsT: React component that fetches and displays a sorted table of admin action logs (block, unblock, role change) with badges, timestamps, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/BlockUserModal.t: A modal dialog that allows admins to block a user with an optional reason, using the `useBlockUser` mutation hook and displaying success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: A countdown timer component that calculates and displays days/hours/minutes/seconds remaining until a target bigint timestamp, updating every second and turning red when under one hour.
frontend/src/components/CreatePromotionD: A dialog form for creating a new promotion, supporting multiple promotion types with conditional discount/bonus fields, validation, and submission via the `useCreatePromotion` mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditPromotionDia: A dialog form for editing an existing promotion's description, discount, bonus, and time fields, pre-populated from the promotion prop and submitted via the `useUpdatePromotion` mutation.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Exports a configurable spinning loader component in three sizes and a full-page `PageLoader` wrapper centered on the screen.
frontend/src/components/LotteryCard.tsx: Displays a lottery's details (name, prize pool, ticket price, fill progress, draw time) in a card, using live stats from `useGetLotteryLiveStats` and showing digit-count and interval badges.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with logo, dynamic nav links based on auth state, an admin panel link for admin users, a coin balance display, and login/logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/NumberPicker.tsx: A multi-digit number input component that renders individual digit boxes with keyboard navigation, backspace handling, and paste support, grouped visually with dashes.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofUplo: A file upload component for payment proof images that supports drag-and-drop and click-to-upload, displays a preview with a clear button, and returns the file as a base64 string.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a display name and optional email from a new user and saves their profile to the backend canister via the actor.
A styled banner component that displays promotion details (type, discount, bonus, description, end date) with type-specific icons, labels, and color schemes.
frontend/src/components/TicketCard.tsx: A card component that displays a lottery ticket's number, purchase date, and winner status, showing prize amount and a link to results for winning tickets.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: A fixed-position toast notification container that renders success, error, and info toasts with icons and a dismiss button, consuming the ToastContext.
frontend/src/components/TransactionRow.t: A row component that displays a single transaction with a type-specific icon, label, formatted amount with sign, and timestamp, supporting various transaction types like wins, purchases, and bonuses.
frontend/src/components/UnblockUserModal: A confirmation dialog modal that allows admins to unblock a user, calling the unblockUser mutation and showing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication context including user profile state, profile fetching logic, and helpers for profile setup completion and refetching, built on top of Internet Identity and the backend actor.
frontend/src/contexts/ToastContext.tsx: Provides a toast notification context with helpers for showing success, error, and info toasts that auto-dismiss after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and a React context provider for use throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines all React Query hooks and TypeScript interfaces for interacting with the backend, covering lottery pools, user profiles, wallet transactions, balance requests, withdrawals, promotions, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, imports Google Fonts, defines CSS custom properties for the dark gold-themed design system, and adds custom utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class name merging, formatting coin amounts, dates, countdown timers, and draw interval labels/colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AddBalance.tsx: Page that allows users to submit a balance top-up request by entering an amount (with quick-select buttons) and a payment screenshot URL, then awaits admin approval.
Admin dashboard showing platform stats (revenue, active users, lotteries, pending approvals) and a grid of quick-action links to key admin management pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BalanceRequests: Admin page for reviewing user balance top-up requests with filtering by status (pending/approved/rejected) and actions to approve or reject each request with optional notes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DrawDeclaration: Admin page for declaring lottery draw results by selecting an active lottery pool, entering a winning number, and displaying the resulting winners with rank-styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/LotteryManageme: Admin page for creating and managing lottery pools, including a creation form with prize ratios and draw settings, and controls to update the status of existing pools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Promotions.tsx: Admin page for managing promotions, allowing creation and editing of promotion campaigns and granting coin bonuses directly to specific users.
Admin page for managing user accounts with search, block/unblock, role assignment, and manual coin credit functionality displayed in a filterable list.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WithdrawalManag: Admin page for managing user withdrawal requests with filter tabs (all/pending/completed/rejected) and approve/reject actions with optional admin notes.
frontend/src/pages/BuyTicket.tsx: Page for purchasing a lottery ticket for a specific pool, supporting manual or auto-generated ticket numbers, displaying applicable promotions/discounts, and enforcing per-user limits and balance checks.
frontend/src/pages/DrawResults.tsx: Page that displays the draw results for a specific lottery, showing the winning number, prize distribution stats, and a ranked winners list.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public marketing landing page showcasing the LuckyCoins platform with a hero section, stats banner, and feature highlights linking to lotteries and login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, redirecting to the dashboard upon success and displaying security/onboarding info.
frontend/src/pages/LotteryList.tsx: Page listing all active lottery pools with search and draw-interval filter controls, rendering results in a responsive grid of LotteryCard components.
frontend/src/pages/MyTickets.tsx: Displays the current user's lottery tickets with stats (total, won, winnings) and tabbed views for all, won, and pending tickets using data from query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page that authenticates new users via Internet Identity, redirecting to the dashboard on success and displaying feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Shows the user's transaction history with summary stats (winnings, spent, bonuses), a search filter, and tabbed views by transaction type.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard displaying account overview cards for coin balance, active lotteries, and tickets, with quick-action links to add balance, withdraw, and browse lotteries.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalRequest.tsx: Withdrawal request page allowing users to submit coin withdrawals via UPI or bank transfer, with balance validation and a history of past withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to clean sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Collection of validation and formatting utility functions covering email, password, required fields, coin amounts, ticket numbers, dates, and a simple password hashing helper.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette (gold, charcoal, cream, semantic tokens), custom fonts, shadows, border radii, and accordion keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 11) describing the full-stack lottery coin system's architecture, features, DB schema, background jobs, prize distribution rules, and known rendering issues after version 3 deployment.
